selects.select: select *, (format(zlrq,'yyyy.mm.dd')) as archivingDate, cint(tzz+dtz) as drawNums1,cint(zpz+dpz+swp) as photoNums1 from T_Archive

select b.ArchiveID as 案卷ID, c.orderindex as 案卷序号,c.dh as 档号, c.ajtm as 案卷题名,c.bzdw as 编制单位, c.sl as 数量,c.dw as 单位, c.bgqx as 保管期限,c.mj as 密级,c.ljr as 立卷人,format(c.bzksrq,'yyyy.mm.dd') as 编制开始日期, format(c.bzjsrq,'yyyy.mm.dd') as 编制结束日期,c.wzz as 文字, c.tzz as 图纸,c.dtz as 底图, c.zpz as 照片,c.dpz as 底片,c.lydh as 录音带, c.lxdh as 录像带,c.gpz as 光盘,c.cdh as 磁带,c.swp as 缩微片,c.cpz as 磁盘, c.qt as 其他,c.bz as 备注,IIF(isnull(min(b.CreateDate)),'',format(min(b.CreateDate),'yyyy.mm.dd')) as 卷内文件起始时间, IIF(isnull(max(b.CreateDate2)),'',format(max(b.CreateDate2),'yyyy.mm.dd')) as 卷内文件终止时间,c.ajlx as 案卷类型, c.jhlx as 卷盒类型 from T_FileList b,T_Archive c where c.ArchiveID = b.ArchiveID and b.ProjectNO=#ProjectNO# and b.ArchiveID=#ArchiveID# group by b.ArchiveID,c.orderindex ,c.dh , c.ajtm ,c.bzdw , c.sl ,c.dw , c.bgqx,c.mj,c.ljr,c.bzksrq,c.bzjsrq,c.wzz,c.tzz ,c.dtz , c.zpz ,c.dpz,c.lydh , c.lxdh,c.gpz ,c.cdh,c.swp,c.cpz,c.qt,c.bz,c.ajlx,c.jhlx order by c.orderindex

select b.ArchiveID as 案卷ID, c.orderindex as 案卷序号,c.dh as 档号, c.ajtm as 案卷题名,c.bzdw as 编制单位, c.sl as 数量,c.dw as 单位, c.bgqx as 保管期限,c.mj as 密级,c.ljr as 立卷人,format(c.bzksrq,'yyyy.mm.dd') as 编制开始日期, format(c.bzjsrq,'yyyy.mm.dd') as 编制结束日期,c.wzz as 文字, c.tzz as 图纸,c.dtz as 底图, c.zpz as 照片,c.dpz as 底片,c.lydh as 录音带, c.lxdh as 录像带,c.gpz as 光盘,c.cdh as 磁带,c.swp as 缩微片,c.cpz as 磁盘, c.qt as 其他,c.bz as 备注,IIF(isnull(min(b.CreateDate)),'',format(min(b.CreateDate),'yyyy.mm.dd')) as 卷内文件起始时间, IIF(isnull(max(b.CreateDate2)),'',format(max(b.CreateDate2),'yyyy.mm.dd')) as 卷内文件终止时间,c.ajlx as 案卷类型, c.jhlx as 卷盒类型 from T_FileList b,T_Archive c where c.ArchiveID = b.ArchiveID and b.ProjectNO=#ProjectNO# group by b.ArchiveID,c.orderindex ,c.dh , c.ajtm ,c.bzdw , c.sl ,c.dw , c.bgqx,c.mj,c.ljr,c.bzksrq,c.bzjsrq,c.wzz,c.tzz ,c.dtz , c.zpz ,c.dpz,c.lydh , c.lxdh,c.gpz ,c.cdh,c.swp,c.cpz,c.qt,c.bz,c.ajlx,c.jhlx order by c.orderindex
